title: Marriyum felicitates Pakistan team over superb win against India
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 04 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb on Sunday felicitated Pakistan cricket team over a “superb win” against India in Asia Cup 2022.
Congratulations Green Machine on a superb victory ! Team Pakistan Zindabad   #AsiaCup2022
— Marriyum Aurangzeb (@Marriyum_A) September 4, 2022
“Congratulations Green Machine on a superb victory ! Team Pakistan Zindabad,” the minister tweeted.
#شاباش_ٹیم_پاکستان https://t.co/YXItzuPHhR
